title: [Large-scale] Introduction to Online Database Programming Based on Microlearning

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding Basic SQL Syntax and Database Concepts
context.additional_context: Utilizing microlearning content accessible in smartphone environments for current practitioners. Strengthening practical application skills through project-based assessments

learning_goals: Learners can specify practical project requirements by applying the database design process
Learners can analyze real-world business data through data manipulation skills using SQL queries
Learners can integrate with three-tier web applications by understanding relational database concepts

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
